entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
